title: Management of aortic regurgitation and bilateral carotid occlusion in severe Takayasu arteritis.
abstract: We present a patient with Takayasu arteritis and severe aortic valve regurgitation and bilateral carotid artery occlusions, who underwent aortic valve replacement and aorto-bicarotid bypass. The management of the cardiovascular manifestations of Takayasu arteritis is reviewed.
